title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, May 10, 2020
description: Today is Mother's Day, and also the birthday of "Mother" Maybelle Carter (1909), who made her name in country music as part of The Carter Family.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is Mother's Day, and also the birthday of "Mother" Maybelle Carter (1909), who made her name in country music as part of The Carter Family.
